content:
↔ (∀ (j : Nat), j ≤ i + 1 → x.getLsbD j = true) by
        simpa
      constructor
      · intro h j hj
        rcases Nat.le_or_eq_of_le_succ hj with (hj' | rfl)
        · apply h; assumption
        · exact hx
      · intro h j hj; apply h; omega
theorem carry_of_and_eq_zero {x y : BitVec w}
